testsuite.name: com.nopcommerce.demo.testsuite.DesktopPageTest
testsuite.system-out: Click on Computer Menu Tab[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (0ed0cff2a4dc4683782708b333bc9b86)] -> xpath: //div[@class='header-menu']/ul[1]/li//a[text()='Computers ']] Click on Desktop[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (0ed0cff2a4dc4683782708b333bc9b86)] -> xpath: //div[@class='item-grid']/div[1]/div[1]/h2/a] Select Sort By position "Name: Z to A"[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (0ed0cff2a4dc4683782708b333bc9b86)] -> id: products-orderby] Click to see screenshot Screenshot

Click on Computer Menu Tab[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@class='header-menu']/ul[1]/li//a[text()='Computers ']] Click on Desktop[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@class='item-grid']/div[1]/div[1]/h2/a] Select Sort By position "Name: Z to A"[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: products-orderby] Click on add to cart of product "Build your own computer"[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@data-productid='1']/div[2]/div[3]/div[2]/button[1]] Verify the Text 'Build your own computer'[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //h1[contains(text(),'Build your own computer')]] Select2.2 GHz Intel Pentium Dual-Core E2200processor[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: product_attribute_1] Select 8GB [+$60.00] RAM[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //select[@id='product_attribute_2']] Select '400 GB [+$100.00]'[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //input[@id='product_attribute_3_7']] Select OS radio 'Vista Premium [+$60.00]'[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //input[@id='product_attribute_4_9']] Check Two Check boxes 'Microsoft Office [+$50.00]' and 'Total Commander [+$5.00]'[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //input[@id='product_attribute_5_12']] Verify the price '$1,475.00'[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //span[text()='$1,475.00']] Click on 'ADD TO CARD' Button[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //button[@id='add-to-cart-button-1']] Verify the Message 'The product has been added to your shopping cart' on Top green Bar[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@class='bar-notification success']] On green bar Close the bar clicking on the cross button.[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //body/div[@id='bar-notification']/div[1]/span[1]] Then MouseHover on "Shopping cart" and Click on "GO TO CART" button.[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //span[contains(text(),'Shopping cart')]] Click on "GO TO CART" button.[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Go to cart')]] Verify the message "Shopping cart" is display[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //h1[contains(text(),'Shopping cart')]] Change the Qty to 2[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //td[@class='quantity']/input] Click on 'Update shopping cart'[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //button[@id='updatecart']] Verify the Total"$2,950.00" is display[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //td[@class= 'subtotal']/span] Click on checkbox “I agree with the terms of service”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //input[@id='termsofservice']] Click on “CHECKOUT button[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //button[@id='checkout']] Verify the Text “Welcome, Please Sign In!”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //h1[contains(text(),'Welcome, Please Sign In!')]] Click on “CHECKOUT AS GUEST” Tab[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Checkout as Guest')]] Enter Firstname Mani to Firstname field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_FirstName] Enter LastName Patel to LastName field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_LastName] Enter Email ManiPatel@gmail.com to Email field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_Email] Select country [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_CountryId] Enter City[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_City] Enter Address Line 1[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_Address1] Enter Zip code [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_ZipPostalCode] Enter PhoneNumber[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: BillingNewAddress_PhoneNumber] Click on “CONTINUE”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@id='billing-buttons-container']/button[4]] Click on Radio Button “Next Day Air($0.00)”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: shippingoption_1] Click on “CONTINUE”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@id='shipping-method-buttons-container']/button] Select Radio Button “Credit Card”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //input[@id='paymentmethod_1']] Click on “CONTINUE”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@id='payment-method-buttons-container']/button] Select “Master card” From Select credit card dropdown[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: CreditCardType] Enter CardHolder NameMRs M M Patel to CardHolder name field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: CardholderName] Enter Card Number5555 5555 5555 4444 to Card Number field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: CardNumber] Select Expiry Month[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: ExpireMonth] Select Expiry Year[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: ExpireYear] Enter Card coder123to card code field[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> id: CardCode] Click on “CONTINUE”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@id='payment-info-buttons-container']/button] Verify “Payment Method” is “Credit Card”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@class='payment-method-info']/ul/li] Verify “Shipping Method” is “Next Day Air”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@class='shipping-method-info']/ul/li] Verify Total is “$2,950.00”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@class='shipping-method-info']/ul/li] Click on “CONFIRM”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath: //div[@id='confirm-order-buttons-container']//button] Verify the Text “Thank You”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on -> xpath: //button[@class='button-1 order-completed-continue-button']] Verify the text “Welcome to our store”[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (8ab6d18bfcde531fa93650b1eb71c209)] -> xpath:
